visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a pie chart with the following specifications: Chart type: pie, Chart title: 'Monthly Sales Distribution', Axes and labels styling: Use custom colors for the pie slices, with labels in a dark gray color and a font size of 14px, Data series: Provide the data for each series, including the name of each series and its data, formatted appropriately for Highcharts, Custom colors: Use the specific list of colors provided in the JavaScript code, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color and include a legend with a white background and a dark gray border.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a pie chart with a title 'Monthly Sales Distribution'. The chart uses a specific list of colors for the pie slices, which are defined in the JavaScript code. The labels for the pie slices are styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. The data series includes the sales data for each month, with the name of each month and its corresponding sales value. The chart background is set to a light gray color, and a legend is included with a white background and a dark gray border. This configuration ensures that the pie chart is visually appealing and informative, with clear labels and a well-organized legend.
